sense.def:
A sound
je vsaka posamična stvar, ki jo slišimo.

seg.quote: He heard the sound of footsteps in the hall.
He opened the door without a sound.

sense.def:
Sound
je vse, kar lahko slišimo.

seg.quote: Sound travels better in water than in air.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj, na primer hupa,
sounds
, povzroči zvok.

cit.quote: oglasiti se, slišati se, razlegati se

seg.quote: A car passed him at top speed, sounding its horn.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
sounds a particular way
, ima ali povzroči določene vrste zvok.

seg.quote: The rustling of the woman's dress sounded alarmingly loud.
Her footsteps sounded like pistol shots.

sense.def:
Kadar govorimo o načinu, kako nekdo
sounds
, po njegovem govorjenju sklepamo o tem, kako se počuti ali kaj je.

seg.quote: ‘Ah,’ Piper said. He sounded a little discouraged.
You know, you sound just like an insurance salesman.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj, kar smo pravkar prebrali ali slišali,
sounds a particular way
, na nas naredi določen vtis.

seg.quote: ‘They've got a small farm down in Devon.’—‘That sounds nice.’
It sounds to me as though he's just doing it to be awkward.

sense.def:
The sound of something
je vtis, ki si ga ustvarimo, ko nekaj slišimo.

seg.quote: I don't like the sound of linguistics.

sense.def:
Kar je
sound
, je v dobrem stanju in ni okvarjeno.

Kadar je nekaj, na primer nasvet,
sound
, je zanesljiv in razumen.

To be sound asleep
pomeni trdno spati.

To sound someone out
pomeni nekomu postaviti vrsto vprašanj, da bi ugotovili, kaj misli.
